sentence.Network_en: Skiers should be particularly choosy about the insurance policy they buy.
sentence.Network_cn: 滑雪者在选择购买保险的问题上应该尤其慎重。

sentence.Network_en: I'm very choosy about my clothes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对自己的衣着很讲究。

sentence.Network_en: A hungry person is not choosy about his food.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求ch开头的英语单词，越多越好……_百度知道 ... cherish 珍爱，关心 choosy 挑剔的 chafe 恼怒，不耐烦.
英语学习境界[转载] ... cutting-edge technology 尖端技术 choosy 挑挑拣拣的 nosy 爱打听消息的.
英美常用词汇对照表 - 新月空中英语 ... Christian name (名字) choosy (好挑剔的) cinema (电影院).
SSAT词汇表【6老师出品】 - 豆丁网 ... choke 咽住；(使)窒息 choosy 爱挑剔的；难讨好的 choreographer 舞蹈设计；.

list.abs: Some appetite for small children choosy food , no appetite ., 一些挑食的孩子胃口小 , 没有食欲.
in private schools the parents are choosy customers . they care more about the quality of instruction than the snazziness of the premises .在私立学校里，父母们是挑剔的顾客，他们关注的更多的是教育质量，而不是时髦的教学楼。
choosy mothers choose Jif for their kids .挑剔的妈妈，专为孩子挑“吉福”。
A beaver looking for a building site is very choosy ., 河狸寻找造窝的场所时是很挑剔的.

entry.def: Someone who is choosy is difficult to please because they will only accept something if it is exactly what they want or if it is of very high quality.

example.ex: Skiers should be particularly choosy about the insurance policy they buy.
example.tran: 滑雪者在选择购买保险的问题上应该尤其慎重。

auth_sentence.content: Hence they develop the instinct to be choosy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence they develop the instinct to be choosy.

auth_sentence.content: Out of all three women, the choosy woman was the most preferred by all the male participants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Out of all three women, the choosy woman was the most preferred by all the male participants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Out of all three women, the choosy woman was the most preferred by all the male participants.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps it is condoned for men to be more sexually promiscuous, but does it mean they aren't choosy?
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps it is condoned for men to be more sexually promiscuous, but does it mean they aren't choosy?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps it is condoned for men to be more sexually promiscuous, but does it mean they aren't choosy?

sentences.en: She’s very choosy about what she eats and drinks.
